title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. III, subch. D, pt. 1647 - Operating Period Accounting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. III, subch. D, pt. 1647 - Operating Period Accounting

State Regulations

Subpart 1647-1 - General (§ 1647-1.1 to 1647-1.2)

Subpart 1647-2 - Vacancy And Collection Loss Reserve (§ 1647-2.1 to 1647-2.5)

Subpart 1647-3 - Painting And Decorating Reserve (§ 1647-3.1 to 1647-3.5)

Subpart 1647-4 - Replacement Reserve (§ 1647-4.1 to 1647-4.9)

Subpart 1647-5 - Reserve Fund (§ 1647-5.1 to 1647-5.5)

Subpart 1647-6 - Accounts Payable, Accruals And Deferred Charges (§ 1647-6.1 to 1647-6.5)

Subpart 1647-7 - Closing The Books (§ 1647-7.1 to 1647-7.6)

Subpart 1647-8 - Periodical Financial Reports-operating Period (§ 1647-8.1 to 1647-8.4)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. III, subch. D, pt. 1647

Statutory authority: Public Housing Law, §§14, 19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
